org.apache.flex.compiler.clients

Class MXMLC

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.clients.MXMLC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.flex.tools.FlexTool
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ASDOC, COMPC

    public class MXMLC
extends Object
implements org.apache.flex.tools.FlexTool
    The entry-point class for mxmlc.

      • staticMainNoExit

        Entry point for the <mxmlc> Ant task.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments.
        Returns:
        An exit code.

      • isFatalFailure

        public static boolean isFatalFailure(int code)
        Determines whether an exit code should be considered a fatal failure, such as for an Ant task.
        Parameters:
        code - A numeric exit code.
        Returns:
        true if the Ant task failed.

      • getName

        Specified by:

      • mainNoExit

        public int mainNoExit(String[] args)
        Entry point for when you already have an MXMLC instance. This is for unit testing.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments.
        Returns:
        An exit code.

      • mainNoExit

        public int mainNoExit(String[] args,
             OutputStream err)
        Entry point for when you already have an MXML instance and want to redirect System.err. This is for unit testing.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments.
        err - An OutputStream to use instead of System.err.
        Returns:
        An exit code.

      • mainCompileOnly

        public int mainCompileOnly(String[] args,
                  OutputStream err)
        Entry point for when you already have an MXML instance and just want to compile and not link. This is for FB integration, but other IDEs could use this too.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line arguments.
        err - An OutputStream to use instead of System.err.
        Returns:
        An exit code.

        Parameters:
        msg - Message text.

        protected void waitAndClose()
        Wait till the workspace to finish compilation and close.

      • close

        protected void close()
        Force terminate the compilation process.

      • createConfigurator

        protected Configurator createConfigurator()
        Create a new Configurator. This method may be overridden to allow Configurator subclasses to be created that have custom configurations.
        Returns:
        a new instance or subclass of Configurator.

      • configure

        public boolean configure(String[] args)
        Load configurations from all the sources.
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments
        Returns:
        True if mxmlc should continue with compilation.

      • getConfigurationDefaultVariable

        protected String getConfigurationDefaultVariable()
        Get the default variable for this configuration. MXMLC has a default variable of "file-spec" and COMPC has default variable of "include-classes".
        Returns:
        the default variable for the configuration.

                           throws ConfigurationException
        Validate target file.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException

        protected boolean compile()
        Main body of this program. This method is called from the public static method's for this program.
        Returns:
        true if compiler succeeds

        Setup theme files.

      • buildArtifact

        protected void buildArtifact()
                      throws InterruptedException,
                             IOException
        Build target artifact.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - threading error
        IOException - IO error

      • getTargetType

        protected ITarget.TargetType getTargetType()
        Virtual method that returns the type of target we are building. Subclasses will override this method to return different target types.
        Returns:
        The ITarget.TargetType of the target we are building.

      • setupTargetFile

        protected boolean setupTargetFile()
                           throws InterruptedException
        MXMLC uses target file as the main compilation unit and derive the output SWF file name from this file.
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • setupLocaleSettings

        protected void setupLocaleSettings()
        Setups the locale related settings.

      • toFiles

        public static List<File> toFiles(List<String> paths)
        Convert file path strings to File objects. Null values are discarded.
        Parameters:
        paths - list of paths.
        Returns:
        List of File objects. No null values will be returned.

      • toFileSpecifications

        public static List<IFileSpecification> toFileSpecifications(List<String> paths,
                                            Workspace workspace)
        Resolve a list of normalized paths to IFileSpecification objects from the given workspace.
        Parameters:
        paths - A list of normalized paths.
        workspace - Workspace.
        Returns:
        A list of file specifications.

      • getProgramName

        protected String getProgramName()
        Get my program name.
        Returns:
        always "mxmlc".

      • getStartMessage

        protected String getStartMessage()
        Get the start up message that contains the program name with the copyright notice.
        Returns:
        The startup message.

      • isCompc

        protected boolean isCompc()
        "compc" subclass will override this method.
        Returns:
        False if the client is not "compc".
